text:
Hi everyone, I'm building a marketplace module & have been stuck on 1 error from past couple of days would be glad if anyone would be able to help.
The error is : *Module inherits standard fields*  Module with field type(s) color needs to inherit from at least one of the following standard field names. Please add [theme.primary_color,theme.secondary_color].
I've tried adding the suggested variables but its still showing the same after running the validation. I've also attached the fields.json file for reference.
Hey <@U07MK8VP6JJ>, try changing the inherited value in the fields.json from `brand_settings.primaryColor` to `theme.primary_color`
<@UJAPS2K4N> thanks for replying, I tried that also no luck... its showing error
